intro: Koernickanthe orbiculata, commonly known as the orbicular koernickanthe, is a species of flowering plant in the family Gesneriaceae. It is native to certain regions of Southeast Asia, particularly in countries like Malaysia and Indonesia. The plant is characterized by its orbicular (round) leaves and showy, tubular flowers that typically bloom in shades of red or orange. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in tropical rainforests. Due to its ornamental value, it is occasionally cultivated in botanical gardens and as a houseplant.
